div.class: entry-box post-3520 page type-page status-publish hentry

div.h3: In today’s fast-paced and bustling society, it may seem impossible to find a place that offers both tranquility and excitement within the same area. Jones County, in Middle Georgia, is such a place, offering businesses, families, and retirees an endearing and affordable lifestyle.

article.p: The Jones County Board of Commissioners meet at 6:00 p.m. every 1st and 3rd Tuesday of the month at the Jones County Government Center.
List of local events and “Things To Do” in Jones County. Featuring meetings, holiday parades, festivals, and updates on what’s happening.
Jones County is committed to using its website and Internet-based solutions to help you do business with the county–without having to visit offices.
Jones County provides public records, upon request, in compliance with the Georgia Open Records Act.
If you are a consultant, service provider, contractor, vendor, or supplier, this is a convenient places to view all current bids.
If you are a vendor, service provider, contractor or other supplier, please click here to register to receive notifications of opportunities to do business with Jones County.

h2.a: Sanitation Roll Off Driver (full- time) PW20-02401

div.p: The Jones County Board of Commissioners is accepting applications for a Sanitation Roll Off Driver. This position requires the operation of various types and sizes of trucks. The applicant must have 1-3 years’ experience, a valid Georgia CDL GVWR over 26,000, and must meet Driving Record requirements as set forth by the county. The applicant…

The Jones County Board of Commissioners is accepting applications for a Laborer. This position requires light to heavy manual labor and involves working in all types of weather conditions. Must be able to safely use common hand tools, garden/yard equipment, and various power tools. Must have High School Diploma or GED and valid Georgia driver’s…

Good morning Jones County. We will be closing Lake Jonesco Golf Course on Monday’s only for the foreseeable future. We are allowing the public to come fish on Mondays while we are closed to Golfers. I know this will upset some and others will be glad they can fish. This decision is made in efforts…
Click HERE to learn more about the Jones County Commissioners.
